definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: One reason is the increasing upward mobility of the younger generation.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一是年輕一代的上進心增強了。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated and reliable person and pleasant personality.
sentences.chinese: 上進心強，爲人可靠，性格開朗。

sentences.english: One of the reason is the young generation is more aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一是年輕一代的上進心增強了。

sentences.english: I’m smart, ambitious and have strong interpersonal skills.
sentences.chinese: 我聰明機智，上進心強，並具有很強的人際關係技巧。

sentences.english: The desire to advance of a youth is an asset of great value.
sentences.chinese: 青年人的上進心是十分可貴的。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated E and reliable person with excellent health and pleasant personality.
sentences.chinese: 上進心強又可靠，並且身體健康，性格開朗E。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated and reliable with systematical thinking approach.
sentences.chinese: 上進心強，可靠，並具有系統化的思考方法。

sentences.english: One of my roommates, Francis, is an aspiring actor.
sentences.chinese: 我的室友當中，法蘭西斯是非常有上進心的演員。

sentences.english: First, the younger generation are becoming independent and want to live on their own.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一是年輕一代的上進心增強了。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated 5 and reliable person with excellent health and pleasant personality.
sentences.chinese: 上進心強又可靠，並且身體健康，性格開朗5。

sentences.english: Fortunately, her daughter Xiao Song very motivated, college entrance examination to the two lines.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，她的女兒小宋很有上進心，高考的兩條線。

sentences.english: Detail-oriented, responsible and motivated, willing to learn and improve;
sentences.chinese: 注意細節，負責任，有上進心，願意提升並不斷學習。

sentences.english: Should not be abandoned and some emotional state, self-motivated will start to recover.
sentences.chinese: 拋棄不應該有的情緒狀態，上進心便開始復甦。

sentences.english: Upward mobility is another plus for the health care profession.
sentences.chinese: 對於健康護理崗位，上進心是另一個加分點。

definition: to like to look good in the eyes of others/sensitive about how one is regarded by others/proud
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
to take care of one's family
the families are well-matched in terms of social status (idiom)/(of a prospective marriage partner) an appropriate match
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
